articles.title: Dick Van Dyke Credits His Longevity to One Habit, And It's Backed by Science - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Dick Van Dyke, the legendary American actor and comedian who starred in classics such as Mary Poppins and Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, turns 100 on December 13.
